choose.when: INSERT INTO TB_OPR_BIKE ( BIKE_ID , BIKE_NO ,TERMINAL_ID ,BIKE_STUS_CD ,TOT_MOVE_DIST ,LAST_CHK_DTTM ,REG_DTTM ,REG_ID ,MOD_DTTM ,MOD_ID ,LOST_YN ,CENTER_ID ,ENTRPS_CD ,BIKE_SE_CD ) VALUES ( #{DEVICE_ID} ,#{DEVICE_NO} ,null ,'BKS_004' ,0.00 ,CONCAT(#{LAST_CHK_DTTM}, ' ', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s')) ,now() ,#{ADMIN_ID} ,now() ,#{ADMIN_ID} ,'N' ,( SELECT CENTER_ID FROM spb.TB_OPR_CENTER WHERE REPLACE(CENTER_NAME,' ','') = REPLACE( #{LOCATE_NAME},' ','')) ,(SELECT S.COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'ENT' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{ENTRPS_CD},' ', '') ) ,(SELECT B.COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD B INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD LA ON B.COM_CD = LA.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'BIK' AND LA.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{BIKE_SE_CD},' ', '') ) )

INSERT INTO TB_IOT_DEVICE ( DEVICE_ID ,DEVICE_MODL_CD ,SERIAL_NO ,DEVICE_STUS_CD ,REG_DTTM ,LAST_CHK_DTTM ,ENTRPS_CD ) VALUES ( #{DEVICE_ID}
, #{DEVICE_MODL_CD} ,#{SERIAL_NO} ,'DES_002' ,now() ,CONCAT(#{LAST_CHK_DTTM}, ' ', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s')) ,(SELECT S.COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'ENT' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{ENTRPS_CD},' ', '') ) )

INSERT INTO TB_IOT_DEVICE ( DEVICE_ID ,DEVICE_MODL_CD ,SERIAL_NO ,IP_V4_ADDR ,DEVICE_STUS_CD ,REG_DTTM ,LAST_CHK_DTTM ,ENTRPS_CD ) VALUES ( #{DEVICE_ID} ,'DM1' ,#{SERIAL_NO} ,#{IP_V4_ADDR} ,'APS_004' ,NOW() ,CONCAT(#{LAST_CHK_DTTM}, ' ', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s')) ,(SELECT S.COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'ENT' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{ENTRPS_CD},' ', '') ) )

INSERT INTO uc_crs_consl_hist( CUST_NM , CONSL_DATE , TALK_STRT_DT , TALK_END_DT , TALK_TNO , CONSL_LCD , CONSL_MCD , REQUEST_CONSL_DSCRP) VALUES ( #{CUST_NM} , DATE_FORMAT(#{CONSL_DATE}, '%Y-%m-%d') , #{TALK_STRT_DT} , #{TALK_END_DT} , #{TALK_TNO} , (SELECT COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_CALL_COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD IS NULL AND REPLACE(CD_DESC1,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{CONSL_LCD},' ', '')) , (SELECT COM.COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_CALL_COM_CD COM, spb.TB_SYS_CALL_COM_CD COMUP WHERE COM.COM_UP_CD = COMUP.COM_CD AND REPLACE(COMUP.CD_DESC1,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{CONSL_LCD},' ', '') AND REPLACE(COM.CD_DESC1,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{CONSL_MCD},' ', '')) , #{REQUEST_CONSL_DSCRP} )
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO TB_OPR_RACK ( RACK_ID ,RACK_STUS_CD ,LAST_CHK_DTTM ,NOW_LOCATE_ID ,NOW_LOCATE_CLS_CD ,NOW_STATION_EQUIP_ORD ,REG_DTTM ,REG_ID ,MOD_DTTM ,MOD_ID ,ENTRPS_CD ) VALUES ( #{DEVICE_ID} ,'RAS_003' ,CONCAT(#{LAST_CHK_DTTM}, ' ', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s')) ,(SELECT A.STATION_ID FROM spb.TB_OPR_STATION A, spb.TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION G WHERE A.STATION_ID = G.STATION_ID AND REPLACE(G.STATION_NAME,' ','') = REPLACE(#{LOCATE_NAME},' ','') AND G.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001') ,'S' ,#{RACK_ORDER_NO} ,now() ,#{ADMIN_ID} ,now() ,#{ADMIN_ID} ,(SELECT S.COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'ENT' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{ENTRPS_CD},' ', '') ) )

choose.when: INSERT INTO TB_OPR_BIKE_LOCATE_HIST ( BIKE_ID ,LOCATE_CLS_CD ,LOCATE_ID ,LOCATE_STR_DTTM ,LOCATE_END_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{DEVICE_ID} ,'C' ,( SELECT CENTER_ID FROM spb.TB_OPR_CENTER WHERE REPLACE(CENTER_NAME,' ','') = REPLACE( #{LOCATE_NAME},' ','')) ,DATE_ADD(now() ,interval 1 second) ,STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') )

INSERT INTO TB_IOT_AP_LOCATE_INFO ( DEVICE_ID ,LOCATE_STR_DTTM ,LOCATE_END_DTTM ,LOCATE_CLS_CD ,LOCATE_ID ,LOCATE_ADMIN_ID ) VALUES ( #{DEVICE_ID} ,DATE_ADD(now() ,interval 1 second) ,STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') ,'C' ,( SELECT CENTER_ID FROM spb.TB_OPR_CENTER WHERE REPLACE(CENTER_NAME,' ','') = REPLACE( #{LOCATE_NAME},' ','')) ,#{ADMIN_ID} )
choose.otherwise:
INSERT INTO TB_OPR_RACK_LOCATE_INFO ( RACK_ID ,LOCATE_CLS_CD ,LOCATE_ID ,LOCATE_STR_DTTM ,LOCATE_END_DTTM ,STATION_EQUIP_ORD
) VALUES ( #{DEVICE_ID} ,'S' , (SELECT A.STATION_ID FROM spb.TB_OPR_STATION A, spb.TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION G WHERE A.STATION_ID = G.STATION_ID AND REPLACE(G.STATION_NAME,' ','') = REPLACE(#{LOCATE_NAME},' ','') AND G.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001') ,DATE_ADD(now() ,interval 1 second) ,STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') ,#{RACK_ORDER_NO} )

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spb.TB_OPR_CENTER WHERE REPLACE(CENTER_NAME,' ','') = REPLACE(#{CENTER_NAME},' ','')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spb.TB_OPR_STATION A, spb.TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION G WHERE A.STATION_ID = G.STATION_ID AND REPLACE(G.STATION_NAME,' ','') = REPLACE(#{STATION_NAME},' ','') AND G.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spb.TB_OPR_RACK WHERE NOW_LOCATE_ID = (SELECT A.STATION_ID FROM spb.TB_OPR_STATION A, spb.TB_OPR_MLANG_STATION G WHERE A.STATION_ID = G.STATION_ID AND REPLACE(G.STATION_NAME,' ','') = REPLACE(#{LOCATE_NAME},' ','') AND G.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001') AND NOW_STATION_EQUIP_ORD = #{RACK_ORDER_NO}

choose.when: SELECT COUNT(DEVICE_ID) FROM spb.TB_IOT_DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{DEVICE_ID} AND DEVICE_MODL_CD= 'DM2'
SELECT COUNT(DEVICE_ID) FROM spb.TB_IOT_DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{DEVICE_ID} AND DEVICE_MODL_CD= 'DM1'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'PAR' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{PART_NAME},' ', '')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spb.TB_MTC_STOCK_LIST WHERE CENTER_ID = (SELECT CENTER_ID FROM spb.TB_OPR_CENTER WHERE REPLACE(CENTER_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{CENTER_NAME},' ', '') ) AND PART_CD = (SELECT S.COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'PAR' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{PART_CD},' ', '') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spb.TB_MTC_STOCK_LIST ( CENTER_ID ,PART_CD ,STOCK_QUNT ) VALUES ( (SELECT CENTER_ID FROM spb.TB_OPR_CENTER WHERE REPLACE(CENTER_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{CENTER_NAME},' ', '') ) ,(SELECT S.COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'PAR' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{PART_CD},' ', '') ) ,#{STOCK_QUNT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE spb.TB_MTC_STOCK_LIST SET STOCK_QUNT = (STOCK_QUNT + #{STOCK_QUNT}) WHERE CENTER_ID = (SELECT CENTER_ID FROM spb.TB_OPR_CENTER WHERE REPLACE(CENTER_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{CENTER_NAME},' ', '') ) AND PART_CD = (SELECT S.COM_CD FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'PAR' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{PART_CD},' ', '') )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(S.COM_CD) FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'ENT' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{ENTRPS_CD_NM},' ', '')

SELECT COUNT(S.COM_CD) FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD S INNER JOIN spb.TB_SYS_MLANG_COM_CD L ON S.COM_CD = L.COM_CD WHERE COM_UP_CD = 'BIK' AND L.LANG_CLS_CD = 'LAG_001' AND REPLACE(MLANG_COM_CD_NAME,' ', '') = REPLACE(#{BIKE_SE_CD},' ', '')
